notInstalled.title: Git Not Installed
notInstalled.description: Git is required for version control features.

desktopRequired.title: Desktop App Required
desktopRequired.description: Git features are only available in the Cognia desktop application.

noRepo.title: Not a Git Repository
noRepo.description: This directory is not initialized as a Git repository.

commitDialog.title: Commit Changes
commitDialog.description: Create a new commit with the staged changes.
commitDialog.willStageAll: All unstaged changes will be staged before committing.

branches.title: Branches
branches.createBranchDescription: Create a new branch from the current HEAD or a specific commit.
branches.startPointPlaceholder: HEAD, commit hash, or branch name
branches.startPointHint: Leave empty to create from current HEAD.
branches.deleteBranchConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete branch '{branch}'?

stash.title: Stash
stash.noStashesHint: Save your work in progress to the stash.
stash.includeUntrackedHint: Also stash files that are not tracked by Git.
stash.dropStashConfirm: Are you sure you want to drop stash@{{{index}}}?
stash.clearAllConfirm: Are you sure you want to clear all {count} stashes? This cannot be undone.

diff.binaryOrEmpty: Binary file or no content available

notInstalled.title: Git Not Installed
notInstalled.description: Install Git to enable version control for this project.

notConfigured.title: Git Not Configured
notConfigured.description: Enable Git to track changes in this project.

initDialog.title: Initialize Git Repository
initDialog.description: Set up version control for this project.
initDialog.repoPathHint: Select or enter the path where you want to initialize Git.

commitDialog.title: Commit Changes
commitDialog.description: Create a new commit with all staged changes.

settings.title: Git Settings
settings.commitOnSessionEndDescription: Create a commit when the chat session ends

branchSelector.title: Conversation Branches
branchSelector.hint: Click "Branch" on a message to create a new branch
branchSelector.deleteDesc: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? This will delete all messages in this branch. This action cannot be undone.
